description: Jurisdiction-targeted regulatory notice with effective and expiry dates for automated scheduling

noticeId.description: Unique identifier for this regulatory notice (e.g. REG-2024-001). Used for tracking and cross-referencing.

title.description: Short title of the regulatory notice

body.description: Full text of the regulatory notice. Supports inline HTML.

effectiveDate.description: Date from which this notice is active. Used to filter out future notices.

expiryDate.description: Date after which this notice is no longer shown. Used to auto-retire expired notices.
